Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45339 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.7.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45339 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.7.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.7.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-45339
